thread.title: ESIC Delhi Recruitment 2017 – Walk in for 51 Sr Resident & Contractual Specialist Posts
thread.title_full: ESIC Delhi Recruitment 2017 – Walk in for 51 Sr Resident & Contractual Specialist Posts

author: publisher12
title: ESIC Delhi Recruitment 2017 – Walk in for 51 Sr Resident & Contractual Specialist Posts
text: 3. Contractual Specialist (Full time Contract Basis): 06 Posts a. Anesthesia/ Intensive Care Unit: 03 Posts b. Radiology: 01 Post c. Surgery: 02 Posts   not be exceeding 35 years for Post 1, 2, 45 years for Post 3 as on the date of interview. Age relaxation is applicable for SC/ ST/ OBC candidates as per rules.   PG Degree/ Diploma in concerned specialty for Post 1, MBBS for Post 2, PG Degree/ DNB/ Diploma in concerned specialty for Post 3 from recognized university with relevant experience.   interview. Application Fee: Candidates should pay Rs. 300/- (Rs.75/- in case of SC/ ST candidates) by demand draft drawn in favor of “ESI Fund Account No. I. No application fee for Women Candidates.   attend for walk in interview along with application in prescribed format, original and set of attested photocopies of testimonials including Matriculation (proof of age), MBBS, Diploma, Degree, Caste and experience certificates with demand draft on 05, 06-01-2017 at 09:00 AM. Important Dates: Date & Time of Interview for Post 1a, 1b, 1c, 1d, 2a, 2b, 2d, 2h, 3a, 3b 05-01-2017 at 09:30 AM Date & Time of Interview for Post 1e, 1f, 1g, 2c, 2e, 2f, 2g, 3b 06-01-2017 at 09:30 AM
